var items = $('06. List Query').all().map(function(item) { return item.json; }).filter(function(b) { return b.id; });
var countResult = $('05. Count Query').first().json;
var parser = $('02. Parser').first().json;
var total = parseInt(countResult.total) || 0;
var totalPages = Math.ceil(total / parser.limit) || 1;

var bons = items.map(function(b) { return ({
  id: b.id,
  tenant_id: b.tenant_id,
  client_final_id: b.client_final_id,
  numero_bdc: b.numero_bdc,
  numeroBdc: b.numero_bdc,
  date_bdc: b.date_bdc,
  dateBdc: b.date_bdc,
  date_validite: b.date_validite,
  dateValidite: b.date_validite,
  montant_ht: b.montant_ht,
  montantHt: b.montant_ht,
  montant_ttc: b.montant_ttc,
  montantTtc: b.montant_ttc,
  tva_taux: b.tva_taux,
  tvaTaux: b.tva_taux,
  description: b.description,
  mode_paiement: b.mode_paiement,
  modePaiement: b.mode_paiement,
  statut: b.statut,
  invoice_id: b.invoice_id,
  invoiceId: b.invoice_id,
  created_at: b.created_at,
  createdAt: b.created_at,
  updated_at: b.updated_at,
  updatedAt: b.updated_at,
  clientFinal: b.client_final_id ? {
    id: b.client_final_id,
    nom: b.client_nom || null,
    prenom: b.client_prenom || null,
    email: b.client_email || null,
    telephone: b.client_telephone || null,
    raisonSociale: b.client_raison_sociale || null
  } : null
}); });

return [{ json: {
  bons,
  count: bons.length,
  total,
  page: parser.page,
  limit: parser.limit,
  totalPages
}}];
